Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging

In-memory and persistent logging facilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeDeploymentLogFilter Deployment log filter.
IAeDeploymentLogger Interface for reporting errors, warnings, and progress information during deployments.
IAeDeploymentLoggerFactory Interface for the deployment logging factory.
IAeLoggingFilter Interface used to filter log events
IAeLogWrapper Wrapper around app server logging.
IAePersistentLogger Interface for handling logging in a persistent environment.
IAeProcessLogEntry Provides an interface for a data structure that contains a segment of logging statements from a process log.
 

Class Summary
AeDeploymentLog Implementation of the error reporter used during the deployment of BPR's.
AeFileDeploymentLoggerFactory Factory for returning instances of the deployment logger that write to a file.
AeFileLogger File based logging.
AeInMemoryProcessLogger Maintains a StringBuffer of formatted process events for each process created and executed by the engine.
AeLoggingFilter Base class with factory method to return a filter given the config setting for logging.
AeLoggingFilter.AeAllowAllFilter Accepts all but READY_TO_EXECUTE
AeLoggingFilter.AeNoDeadPathFilter Subclass of the ALL filter that excludes DEAD_PATH events
AeLogReader Responsible for reading the log for a given process out of the database.
AeLogReader.AeLogEntry Container class for a clob row.
AeLogReader.AeSmallLogHandler A ResultSetHandler that's responsible for walking the entire result set and returning a String that represents the concatenation of all of the clobs.
AePersistentLogger Persistent version of the logger.
AeSequentialClobStream Provides a single InputStream interface to a sequence of Clobs.
AeStructuredDeploymentLog The structured deployment log breaks up the log messages and creates a structure of deployment info objects from them.
AeTeeDeploymentLogger T's the output of the log to two separate loggers.
AeUnstructuredDeploymentLog Provides an unstructured deployment log base class.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging Description

In-memory and persistent logging facilities.
